name: todo
description: A simple, highly customizable todo list for keeping track of things to do
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores reminders (or todos) based on user ids
install_msg:
Thankie for installing Jojo's ToDo cog!
If you would like to request a feature please make an issue on my github (<https://github.com/Just-Jojo/JojoCogs)
Use `[p]todo explain` to see what the cog is about!

(You can also check out Epic's todo cog <https://github.com/npc203/npc-cogs> :D)
author: Jojo#7791
